name: Polar Bear: Bounce.
description:
General :

This game has been developed in order to participate in MY FIRST GAME : Winter 2020 game-jam held from  January 25th 2020 to February 08th 2020. 

Game Idea : 

You control a bear who wants to fish. Bounce the Polar Bear to catch as many fishes you can until you.. well.. be gone. 

How To Play? 

Click on the Polar Bear and hold down to make a projectile path! Release the mouse when comfortable with the path.
